name: Panzer Campaigns:  Tobruk'41
summary: HPS Simulations and John Tiller are proud to announce the release of Tobruk '41, an operational level World War II simulation. Tobruk '41 covers Rommel's Afrika Korps and the fight for Tobruk against the British 8th Army. The game includes operations Battleaxe and Crusader as well as the attacks on Tobruk itself.
